branchCategory.name: LECYM/LECYU, AC Servo Motor, Absolute Type
branchCategory.description: SMC's LECYM/U series is an AC servo motor controller, with a 20-bit absolute encoder. The LECYM/U has a power supply voltage of 200 to 230 VAC with a motor capacity of 100W, 200W, and 400W. The Fieldbus protocol used are MECHATROLINK-II and MECHATROLINK III type for an absolute encoder.

breadCrumb.name: LECYM/LECYU, AC Servo Motor, Absolute Type
